Name: Genesis - 创世争霸
About the game: Genesis is a controller exclusive next generation online-competitive MOBA. Utilizing Unreal 4 Engine, it boasts stunning graphics and smooth control. Genesis differentiates from classic MOBA games by opting for joystick control which is highly optimized and extremely intuitive. Set in a futuristic sci-fi world where gods and men clash to claim dominion, players can experience the joy of Genesis in its PVP or PVE game modes. The game will initially feature a rich roster of 30 heroes and a wide selection of hero, weapon and item cosmetics. Genesis is slated to be published on PC and PS4 in the spring of 2019. Players may provide feedback via communities listed below: Youtube: Rampage Games Twitter: @RampageGames_CN Facebook: Genesis_Official FB Group (Genesis Open Beta Feedback): / Discord： Official Website：
Publishers: Hainan Legendkey Network Technology Co., Ltd.
